en.today: The energy will be tricky to navigate this morning, dear Ram, as Venus squares off with Saturn and Neptune. Emotions grow confusing as boundaries blur, making it difficult to understand your place within certain relationships and situations. Meanwhile, the Scorpio quarter moon generates tension with Mercury RX, inflaming drama as you struggle to find the right words. Put your pride aside when searching for a resolution, but stand firm against those who are being unreasonable or manipulative. The skies clear while Jupiter activates, giving you a chance to evolve alongside loved ones as issues are finally laid to rest.

en.today: Venus, Saturn, and Neptune align amongst the stars, warm lion, putting you in the dreamiest of states. Permit yourself to take a break from reality, allowing your imagination to run wild. Just be mindful of any epiphanies or strokes of genius that arise, considering if these whims could come to fruition with a bit of practical planning. It may be necessary to unpack difficult emotions while the Scorpio quarter moon squares Mercury RX, but getting loved ones to participate might be a tall order. Intuitive breakthroughs find you when Jupiter activates, illuminating new paths toward peace.

en.today: Avoid feeding into worst-case scenarios, dear Taurus, as Venus squares Saturn and Neptune. Disharmony could be the main culprit for triggering upsetting thoughts, and it may be necessary to pull back and recalibrate. Immerse yourself in art, beauty, and comforting foods if you need a way to escape your thoughts—the Scorpio quarter moon and Mercury Retrograde brew issues within your closest connections. Try not to sympathize with people who are being cruel, and speak up if you've felt neglected or taken for granted. Your mood elevates while Jupiter activates, helping you reclaim that sparkle you're so beloved for.

en.today: A technological cleanse may be in order, dearest Gemini, as Venus squares off with Saturn and Neptune. Excessive screen time has likely left you feeling disconnected from your surroundings and friends. Meanwhile, the Scorpio quarter moon and Mercury RX form a harsh aspect, creating a restless yet aimless energy. Your active mind will crave something to do, but a lack of organization could leave you with unfinished tasks and too many projects to keep up with. Simplify your agenda when Jupiter activates, pausing to recognize what needs your immediate attention while finding ways to slow down and relax.
